remarks: Vilcabamba : Family friendly and safe. Tons of fresh fruits and veggies. Yoga and a nice community. Located in a sacred healing Valley with a beautiful river.

Name: Nueiba
remarks: In the area of Nueiba you have Ras el Shitan that is famous. You have the town Dahab that is really fun and great. From there you can go by boat to Abu Galum, which is a very isolated beach but very special. Recommend season is Sep-Oct, or April-June.

Name: Sinai, Dahab
remarks: Not so much Yoga, but beautiful snorkeling and desert and amazing energy.

Name: Ras el Shitan
remarks: In the area of Nueiba you have Ras el Shitan that is famous. You have the town Dahab that is really fun and great. From there you can go by boat to Abu Galum, which is a very isolated beach but very special. Recommend season is sep-October, or April-June.toelichting

Name: Ko Phra Thong
remarks: Very basic not touristic at all. Unspoiled beaches where you are alone. No scooter rental, aircon, 7/11, airport, ferry nor yoga studios. You get all the beach feeling you want.
